tags.name: API related to Embeded design maker
tags.description:
## Get product list

Returns list of Products available in the Printful.

Endpoint: `GET https://api.printful.com/products`
Required scopes: none

Response schema (`application/json`):

| Field    | Type               | Description                |
|----------|--------------------|----------------------------|
| `code`   | integer            | Response status code (200) |
| `result` | array<Product>     |                            |

`Product` schema:

| Field                  | Type              | Description                                                                      |
|------------------------|-------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `id`                   | integer           | Product ID                                                                       |
| `type`                 | string            | Product type identifier                                                          | 
| `type_name`            | string            | Product type name                                                                | 
| `title`                | string            | Product title                                                                    | 
| `brand`                | string            | Brand name                                                                       | 
| `model`                | string            | Model name                                                                       | 
| `image`                | string            | URL of a sample image for this product                                           | 
| `variant_count`        | integer           | Number of available variants for this product                                    | 
| `currency`             | string            | Currency in which prices are returned                                            | 
| `files`                | array<FileType>   | Definitions of Print/Mockup file categories that can be attached to this product | 
| `options`              | array<OptionType> | Definitions of additional options that are available for this product            | 
| `is_discontinued`      | boolean           | If product is disabled in push                                                   | 
| `avg_fulfillment_time` | number            | Average number of days for order to be fulfilled                                 | 
| `description`          | string            | Product description                                                              | 

`FileType` schema:

| Field              | Type   | Description                                                                        |
|--------------------|--------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `type`             | string | File type identifier – use this to specify a file's purpose when creating an order |
| `title`            | string | Display name                                                                       |
| `additional_price` | string | Additional price when this print file type is used                                 |

`OptionType` schema:

| Field                        | Type   | Description                                                               |
|------------------------------|--------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `id`                         | string | Option identifier – use this to specify the option when creating an order |
| `title`                      | string | Display name                                                              |
| `type`                       | string | Data type of this option (currently only `bool` is supported)             |
| `values`                     | object | Option values – [key, value] map                                          |
| `additional_price`           | string | Additional price when this option is used                                 |
| `additional_price_breakdown` | object | Additional price breakdown by type – [key, value] map                     |

This endpoint is documented in the [Catalog API / Get Products](https://developers.printful.com/docs/#operation/getProducts) section of the public documentation.

##  Get product categories

Returns list of Catalog Categories available in the Printful.

Endpoint: `GET https://api.printful.com/categories`
Required scopes: none

Response schema (`application/json`):

| Field    | Type            | Description                |
|----------|-----------------|----------------------------|
| `code`   | integer         | Response status code (200) |
| `result` | array<Category> |                            |

`Category` schema:

| Field       | Type    | Description                                                               |
|-------------|---------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `id`        | integer | Category ID                                                               |
| `parent_id` | integer | ID of the parent Category. If there is no parent Category, 0 is returned. |
| `image_url` | string  | The URL of the Category image                                             |
| `title`     | string  | Category title                                                            |

The endpoint is documented in the [Catalog API / Get Categories](https://developers.printful.com/docs/#operation/getCategories) section of the public documentation.

## Embedded Templates API

### Generate Mockups for saved Embedded template

The endpoint creates an asynchronous mockup generation task. Generation result can be retrieved using mockup
generation task retrieval endpoint.

Endpoint: `POST https://api.printful.com/mockup-generator/create-task/{id}`
Required scopes: none

Path parameters:

| Parameter | Type      | Required | Description |
|-----------|-----------|----------|-------------|
| `id`      | integer   | Yes      | Product ID  |

Header parameters:

| Parameter       | Type     | Description                                                                             |
|-----------------|----------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `X-PF-Store-Id` | integer  | Use this to specify which store you want to use (required only for account level token) |

Request body schema (`application/json`):

| Field                 | Type                      | Required | Description                                                                                                                 |
|-----------------------|---------------------------|----------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `variant_ids`         | array<integer>            | No       | List of variant ids you want to generate.                                                                                   |
| `format`              | string (`jpg` or `png`)   | No       | Generated file format. PNG will have a transparent background, JPG will have a smaller file size.                           |
| `width`               | integer                   | No       | Width of the resulting mockup images (min 50, max 1000, default is 1000)                                                    |
| `product_options`     | object                    | No       | Key-value list of product options (embroidery thread, stitch colors). Product options can be found in Catalog API endpoint. |
| `option_groups`       | object                    | No       | List of option group names you want to generate. Product's option groups can be found in printfile API request.             |
| `options`             | array<string>             | No       | List of option names you want to generate. Product's options can be found in printfile API request.                         |
| `files`               | array<GenerationTaskFile> | No       |                                                                                                                             |
| `product_template_id` | integer                   | No       | Product template id. Use instead of files parameter.                                                                        |

`GenerationTaskFile` schema:

| Field       | Type                       | Required | Description                               |
|-------------|----------------------------|----------|-------------------------------------------|
| `placement` | string                     | No       | Placement identifier (front, back, etc.). |
| `image_url` | string                     | No       | Public URL where your file is stored.     |
| `position`  | GenerationTaskFilePosition | No       | Position                                  |

`GenerationTaskFilePosition` schema:

| Field         | Type    | Required | Description                           |
|---------------|---------|----------|---------------------------------------|
| `area_width`  | integer | No       | Positioning area width on print area  |
| `area_height` | integer | No       | Positioning area height on print area |
| `width`       | integer | No       | Width of the image in given area      |
| `height`      | integer | No       | Height of the image in given area     |
| `top`         | integer | No       | Image top offset in given area        |
| `left`        | integer | No       | Image left offset in given area       |

Response schema (`application/json`):

| Field    | Type           | Description                |
|----------|----------------|----------------------------|
| `code`   | integer        | Response status code (200) |
| `result` | GenerationTask |                            |

`GenerationTask` schema:

| Field        | Type                                        | Description                                                     |
|--------------|---------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------|
| `task_key`   | string                                      | Task identifier you will use to retrieve generated mockups.     |
| `status`     | string (`pending`, `completed` or `failed`) | Status of the generation task.                                  |
| `error`      | string                                      | If task has failed, reason will be provided here.               |
| `mockups`    | array<GenerationTaskMockup>                 | If task is completed, list of mockups will be provided here.    |
| `printfiles` | array<GenerationTaskTemplateFile>           | If task is completed, list of printfiles will be provided here. |

`GenerationTaskMockup` schema:

| Field         | Type                             | Description                                                                                |
|---------------|----------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `placement`   | string                           | Placement identifier.                                                                      | 
| `variant_ids` | array<integer>                   | List of variant ids this mockup is used for. One mockup can be used for multiple variants. | 
| `mockup_url`  | string                           | Temporary URL of the primary mockup.                                                       | 
| `extra`       | array<GenerationTaskExtraMockup> | Optional extra mockups.                                                                    | 

`GenerationTaskExtraMockup` schema:

| Field          | Type           | Description                       |
|----------------|----------------|-----------------------------------|
| `title`        | array<integer> | Display name of the extra mockup. | 
| `url`          | string         | Temporary URL of the mockup.      | 
| `option`       | string         | Style option name                 | 
| `option_group` | string         | Style option group name           | 

`GenerationTaskTemplateFile` schema:

| Field         | Type           | Description                                     |
|---------------|----------------|-------------------------------------------------|
| `variant_ids` | array<integer> | List of variant IDs associated with printfiles. | 
| `placement`   | string         | Placement identifier (front, back, etc.).       | 
| `url`         | string         | Public URL where your file is stored.           | 

The endpoint is documented in the [Mockup Generator API / Create a mockup generation task](https://developers.printful.com/docs/#operation/createGeneratorTask) section of the public documentation.

### Get all Embedded templates

The endpoint returns a list of all templates.

Endpoint: `GET https://api.printful.com/product-templates`
Required scopes: `product_templates/read`

Query parameters:

| Parameter | Type    | Description                        |
|-----------|---------|------------------------------------|
| `offset`  | integer | Result set offset                  |
| `limit`   | integer | Number of items per page (max 100) |

Response schema (`application/json`):

| Field    | Type                | Description                    |
|----------|---------------------|--------------------------------|
| `code`   | integer             | Response status code (200)     |
| `result` | ProductTemplateList | Information about the template |
| `paging` | Paging              | Paging information             |

`ProductTemplateList` schema:

| Field   | Type                    |
|---------|-------------------------|
| `items` | array<ProductTemplate>  |

`ProductTemplate` schema:

| Field                   | Type                 |
|-------------------------|----------------------|
| `id`                    | integer              |
| `product_id`            | integer              |
| `external_product_id`   | string               |
| `title`                 | string               |
| `available_variant_ids` | array<integer>       |
| `option_data`           | array<OptionType>    |
| `colors`                | array<ColorType>     |
| `sizes`                 | array<string>        |
| `mockup_file_url`       | string               |
| `placements`            | array<PlacementType> |
| `created_at`            | integer              |
| `updated_at`            | integer              |

`OptionType` schema:

| Field   | Type          |
|---------|---------------|
| `id`    | string        |
| `value` | array<string> |

`ColorType` schema:

| Field         | Type          |
|---------------|---------------|
| `color_name`  | string        |
| `color_codes` | array<string> |

`PlacementType` schema:

| Field                    | Type    |
|--------------------------|---------|
| `placement`              | string  |
| `display_name`           | string  |
| `technique_key`          | string  |
| `technique_display_name` | string  |

The endpoint is documented in the [Product Templates API](https://developers.printful.com/docs/#tag/Product-Templates-API) section of the public documentation.

### Place an order from Embedded template

Creates a new order and optionally submits it for fulfillment.

Endpoint: `POST https://api.printful.com/orders`
Required scopes: `orders`

Use this endpoint with the Product Template ID or External Product ID associated with a template.

Query parameters:

| Parameter         | Type    | Description                                                                            |
|-------------------|---------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `confirm`         | boolean | Automatically submit the newly created order for fulfillment (skip the Draft phase)    |
| `update_existing` | boolean | Try to update existing order if an order with the specified external_id already exists |

Header parameters:

| Parameter       | Type     | Description                                                                             |
|-----------------|----------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `X-PF-Store-Id` | integer  | Use this to specify which store you want to use (required only for account level token) |

Request body schema (`application/json`):

| Field                 | Type             | Required | Description                                                                                                                                                                     |
|-----------------------|------------------|----------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `external_id`         | string           | No       | Order ID from the external system                                                                                                                                               |
| `shipping`            | string           | No       | Shipping method. Defaults to 'STANDARD'                                                                                                                                         |
| `recipient`           | Address          | Yes      | Information about the address                                                                                                                                                   |
| `items`               | array<Item>      | Yes      | Array of items in the order                                                                                                                                                     |
| `retail_costs`        | OrderRetailCosts | No       | Retail costs that are to be displayed on the packing slip for international shipments. Retail costs are used only if every item in order contains the `retail_price` attribute. |
| `gift`                | OrderGift        | No       | Optional gift message for the packing slip                                                                                                                                      |
| `packing_slip`        | OrderPackingSlip | No       | Custom packing slip for this order                                                                                                                                              |

`Address` schema:

| Field          | Type   | Required | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|----------------|--------|----------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `name`         | string | No       | Full name                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| `company`      | string | No       | Company name                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| `address1`     | string | No       | Address line 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| `address2`     | string | No       | Address line 2                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| `city`         | string | No       | City                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| `state_code`   | string | No       | State code                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `state_name`   | string | No       | State name                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `country_code` | string | No       | Country code                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| `country_name` | string | No       | Country name                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| `zip`          | string | No       | ZIP/Postal code                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| `phone`        | string | No       | Phone number                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| `email`        | string | No       | Email address                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| `tax_number`   | string | Yes/No   | TAX number (`optional`, but in case of Brazil country this field becomes `required` and will be used as CPF/CNPJ number)<br>CPF format is 000.000.000-00 (14 characters);<br>CNPJ format is 00.000.000/0000-00 (18 characters). |

`Item` schema:

| Field                          | Type           | Required | Description                                                                                                        |
|--------------------------------|----------------|----------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `id`                           | integer        | No       | Line item ID                                                                                                       |
| `external_id`                  | string         | No       | Line item ID from the external system                                                                              |
| `variant_id`                   | integer        | Yes      | Variant ID of the item ordered. See Products API                                                                   |
| `product_template_id`          | integer        | Yes/No   | The ID of a Product Template. Either this or `external_product_id` must be provided.                               |
| `external_product_id`          | string         | Yes/No   | The External Product ID associated with a Product Template. Either this or `product_template_id` must be provided. |
| `quantity`                     | integer        | No       | Number of items ordered                                                                                            |
| `price`                        | string         | No       | Printful price of the item                                                                                         |
| `retail_price`                 | string         | No       | Original retail price of the item to be displayed on the packing slip                                              |
| `name`                         | string         | No       | Display name of the item. If not given, a name from the Printful system will be displayed on the packing slip      |
| `product`                      | ProductVariant | No       | Short information about the Printful Product and Variant                                                           |
| `sku`                          | string         | No       | Product identifier (SKU) from the external system                                                                  |

`ProductVariant` schema:

| Field         | Type    | Required | Description                            |
|---------------|---------|----------|----------------------------------------|
| `variant_id`  | integer | No       | Variant ID                             |
| `product_id`  | integer | No       | Product ID of this variant             |
| `image`       | string  | No       | URL of a sample image for this variant |
| `name`        | string  | No       | Display name of this variant           |

`OrderRetailCosts` schema:

| Field          | Type   | Required | Description                                     |
|----------------|--------|----------|-------------------------------------------------|
| `currency`     | string | No       | 3 letter currency code                          |
| `subtotal`     | string | No       | Total cost of all items                         |
| `discount`     | string | No       | Discount sum                                    |
| `shipping`     | string | No       | Shipping costs                                  |
| `digitization` | string | No       | Digitization costs                              |
| `tax`          | string | No       | Sum of taxes (not included in the item price)   |
| `vat`          | string | No       | Sum of vat (not included in the item price)     |
| `total`        | string | No       | rand Total (subtotal-discount+tax+vat+shipping) |

`OrderGift` schema:

| Field     | Type   | Required | Description        |
|-----------|--------|----------|--------------------|
| `subject` | string | No       | Gift message title |
| `message` | string | No       | Gift message text  |

`OrderPackingSlip` schema:

| Field        | Type   | Required | Description                                       |
|--------------|--------|----------|---------------------------------------------------|
| `email`      | string | No       | Customer service email                            |
| `phone`      | string | No       | Customer service phone                            |
| `message`    | string | No       | Custom packing slip message                       |
| `logo_url`   | string | No       | URL address to a sticker we will put on a package |
| `store_name` | string | No       | Store name override for the return address        |

Response schema (`application/json`):

| Field    | Type    | Description                 |
|----------|---------|-----------------------------|
| `code`   | integer | Response status code (200)  |
| `result` | Order   | Information about the Order |

`Order` schema:

| Field                   | Type                    | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|-------------------------|-------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `id`                    | integer                 | Order ID                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| `external_id`           | string                  | Order ID from the external system                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| `store`                 | integer                 | Store ID                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| `status`                | string                  | Order status:<br />**draft** - order is not submitted for fulfillment<br />**failed** - order was submitted for fulfillment but was not accepted because of an error (problem with address, printfiles, charging, etc.)<br />**inreview** - order is being reviewed<br />**pending** - order has been submitted for fulfillment<br />**canceled** - order is canceled<br />**onhold** - order has encountered a problem during the fulfillment that needs to be resolved together with the Printful customer service<br />**inprocess** - order is being fulfilled and is no longer cancellable<br />**partial** - order is partially fulfilled (some items are shipped already, the rest will follow)<br />**fulfilled** - all items are shipped<br /> |
| `shipping`              | string                  | Shipping method. Defaults to 'STANDARD'                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| `shipping_service_name` | string                  | Human readable shipping method name.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| `created`               | integer                 | Time when the order was created                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| `updated`               | integer                 | Time when the order was updated                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| `recipient`             | Address                 | Information about the address                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| `items`                 | array                   | Array of items in the order                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| `incomplete_items`      | array                   | Array of incomplete items in the order                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| `costs`                 | Costs                   | Order costs (Printful prices)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| `retail_costs`          | OrderRetailCosts        | Retail costs that are to be displayed on the packing slip for international shipments. Retail costs are used only if every item in order contains the `retail_price` attribute.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| `pricing_breakdown`     | array<PricingBreakdown> | Difference between order price and retail costs. Will be shown only if order is completed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| `shipments`             | array<OrderShipment>    | Array of shipments already shipped for this order                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| `gift`                  | OrderGift               | Optional gift message for the packing slip                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| `packing_slip`          | OrderPackingSlip        | Custom packing slip for this order                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |

`Costs` schema:

| Field          | Type   | Description                                      |
|----------------|--------|--------------------------------------------------|
| `currency`     | string | 3 letter currency code                           |
| `subtotal`     | string | Total cost of all items                          |
| `discount`     | string | Discount sum                                     |
| `shipping`     | string | Shipping costs                                   |
| `digitization` | string | Digitization costs                               |
| `tax`          | string | Sum of taxes (not included in the item price)    |
| `vat`          | string | Sum of vat (not included in the item price)      |
| `total`        | string | Grand Total (subtotal-discount+tax+vat+shipping) |

`PricingBreakdown` schema:

| Field             | Type   | Description              |
|-------------------|--------|--------------------------|
| `customer_pays`   | string | Amount customer paid     |
| `printful_price`  | string | Printful price           |
| `profit`          | string | Profit                   |
| `currency_symbol` | string | Shipment tracking number |

`OrderShipment` schema:

| Field             | Type    | Description                     |
|-------------------|---------|---------------------------------|
| `id`              | integer | Shipment ID                     |
| `carrier`         | string  | Carrier name                    |
| `service`         | string  | Delivery service name           |
| `tracking_number` | string  | Shipment tracking number        |
| `tracking_url`    | string  | Shipment tracking URL           |
| `created`         | integer | Shipping time                   |
| `ship_date`       | string  | Ship date                       |
| `shipped_at`      | string  | Ship time in unix timestamp     |
| `reshipment`      | boolean | Whether this is a reshipment    |
| `items`           | array   | Array of items in this shipment |

This endpoint is documented in the [Orders API / Create a new order](https://developers.printful.com/docs/#operation/createOrder) section of the public documentation.

### Delete Embedded template

#### Delete by Printful ID

Deletes a single product template by template ID.

Endpoint: `DELETE https://api.printful.com/product-templates/{id}`
Required scopes: `product_templates`

Path parameters:

| Parameter | Type      | Required | Description |
|-----------|-----------|----------|-------------|
| `id`      | integer   | No       | Template ID |

#### Delete by external product ID

Deletes a single product template by External Product ID associated with this.

Endpoint: `DELETE https://api.printful.com/product-templates/@{external_product_id}`
Required scopes: `product_templates`

Path parameters:

| Parameter             | Type   | Required | Description                                                                 |
|-----------------------|--------|----------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `external_product_id` | string | Yes      | External product ID. Note that the ID must be preceded with a `@` character |

## Get compatible products
The endpoint returns a list of all matching products used for the design transfer within the DTG technique
based on the below criteria:

1. Matching technique

2. Matching placements

Endpoint: `GET https://api.printful.com/product-templates/{id}/compatible-products`

Path parameters:

| Parameter | Type      | Required | Description         |
|-----------|-----------|----------|---------------------|
| `id`      | integer   | Yes      | Product template ID |

Query parameters:

| Parameter | Type    | Description                        |
|-----------|---------|------------------------------------|
| `offset`  | integer | Result set offset                  |
| `limit`   | integer | Number of items per page (max 100) |

Response schema (`application/json`):

| Field    | Type               | Description                |
|----------|--------------------|----------------------------|
| `code`   | integer            | Response status code (200) |
| `result` | array<Product>     |                            |

`Product` schema:

| Field                  | Type              | Description                                                                      |
|------------------------|-------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `id`                   | integer           | Product ID                                                                       |
| `type`                 | string            | Product type identifier                                                          | 
| `type_name`            | string            | Product type name                                                                | 
| `title`                | string            | Product title                                                                    | 
| `brand`                | string            | Brand name                                                                       | 
| `model`                | string            | Model name                                                                       | 
| `image`                | string            | URL of a sample image for this product                                           | 
| `variant_count`        | integer           | Number of available variants for this product                                    | 
| `currency`             | string            | Currency in which prices are returned                                            | 
| `files`                | array<FileType>   | Definitions of Print/Mockup file categories that can be attached to this product | 
| `options`              | array<OptionType> | Definitions of additional options that are available for this product            | 
| `is_discontinued`      | boolean           | If product is disabled in push                                                   | 
| `avg_fulfillment_time` | number            | Average number of days for order to be fulfilled                                 | 
| `description`          | string            | Product description                                                              | 

`FileType` schema:

| Field              | Type   | Description                                                                        |
|--------------------|--------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `type`             | string | File type identifier – use this to specify a file's purpose when creating an order |
| `title`            | string | Display name                                                                       |
| `additional_price` | string | Additional price when this print file type is used                                 |

`OptionType` schema:

| Field                        | Type   | Description                                                               |
|------------------------------|--------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `id`                         | string | Option identifier – use this to specify the option when creating an order |
| `title`                      | string | Display name                                                              |
| `type`                       | string | Data type of this option (currently only `bool` is supported)             |
| `values`                     | object | Option values – [key, value] map                                          |
| `additional_price`           | string | Additional price when this option is used                                 |
| `additional_price_breakdown` | object | Additional price breakdown by type – [key, value] map                     |


## Swap product used in product template
This endpoint duplicates the design of one product to another product
based on the provided `product template_id` and `product_id`
**Note** -Design transfer between products works only for product templates with DTG technique.

Endpoint: `POST https://api.printful.com/product-templates/{product_template_id}/swap-product`

Path parameters:

| Parameter             | Type             | Required | Description         |
|-----------------------|------------------|----------|---------------------|
| `product_template_id` | integer / string | Yes      | Product template ID |

Request body schema (`application/json`):

| Field                        | Type    | Required | Description                                                                                                                             |
|------------------------------|---------|----------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `product_id`                 | integer | Yes      | Catalog product ID to which the design will be transferred                                                                              |
| `external_product_id`        | string  | Yes      | External merchant-side product ID unique for the new template                                                                           |

Response schema (`application/json`):

| Field    | Type            | Description                         |
|----------|-----------------|-------------------------------------|
| `code`   | integer         | Response status code (200)          |
| `result` | ProductTemplate | Information about the  new template |

`ProductTemplate` schema:

| Field                   | Type                 |
|-------------------------|----------------------|
| `id`                    | integer              |
| `product_id`            | integer              |
| `external_product_id`   | string               |
| `title`                 | string               |
| `available_variant_ids` | array<integer>       |
| `option_data`           | array<OptionType>    |
| `colors`                | array<ColorType>     |
| `sizes`                 | array<string>        |
| `mockup_file_url`       | string               |
| `placements`            | array<PlacementType> |
| `created_at`            | integer              |
| `updated_at`            | integer              |

`OptionType` schema:

| Field   | Type          |
|---------|---------------|
| `id`    | string        |
| `value` | array<string> |

`ColorType` schema:

| Field         | Type          |
|---------------|---------------|
| `color_name`  | string        |
| `color_codes` | array<string> |

`PlacementType` schema:

| Field                    | Type    |
|--------------------------|---------|
| `placement`              | string  |
| `display_name`           | string  |
| `technique_key`          | string  |
| `technique_display_name` | string  |

## Create an order from a template

You can use the URLs of printfiles retrieved by the previous call in the files array.
To submit an order with an item created from a template, you need to pass:
* `variant_id` compatible with the template (see section 4.3.5),
* the Product Template ID or External Product ID,
* the store ID (see section 4.3.4)

You can pass one or more items in the request. Each item may be created from the same template or different ones.
You can also mix Product Template ID and External Product ID for different items.

Request example with a single item using Product Template ID:

```
POST https://api.printful.com/orders
Authorization: Bearer {token}
Content-Type: application/json
X-PF-Store-ID: {storeId}

{
    "recipient": {
        "name": "John Doe",
        "address1": "19749 Dearborn St",
        "city": "Chatsworth",
        "state_code": "CA",
        "country_code": "US",
        "zip": "91311"
    },
    "items": [
        {
            "variant_id": 11325,
            "quantity": 1,
            "product_template_id": 123456789
        }
    ]
}
```

There might be a situation where product template printfiles did not finish generating.
In that case we would change the
order status to `ONHOLD` and automatically change it back to the `DRAFT` status after the printfiles are ready.
Such order needs to be then manually confirmed by:

```
POST https://api.printful.com/orders/{order_id}/confirm
Authorization: Bearer {token}
Content-Type: application/json
X-PF-Store-ID: {storeId}
```


## Generate Mockups from a template (optional)

**Note**: If you only want to create an order without generating additional mockups, you can skip this section.

At this point, you should have:
* the ID of the saved template, passed in a parameter of `onTemplateSaved` callback function,
* the store ID (section 4.3.4),
* variant ID returned in `available_variant_ids` field of the `GET /product-templates/{id}` response (section 4.3.5).

Replace `{templateId}` in the following examples with the actual template ID you receive and `{storeId}` with the ID
of the store for which the calls will be made.

Request:

```
POST https://api.printful.com/mockup-generator/create-task/162
Authorization: Bearer {token}
Content-Type: application/json
X-PF-Store-ID: {storeId}

{
    "variant_ids": [6481],
    "format": "jpg",
    "product_template_id": {templateId}
}
```

Response body:

```
{
    "code": 200,
    "result": {
        "task_key": "{taskKey}",
        "status": "pending"
    },
    "extra": []
}
```

## Retrieving the mockup generation task result

**Note**: If you only want to create an order without generating additional mockups, you can skip this section.

This endpoint returns asynchronous mockup generation task result. If generation task is completed, it will contain a list of generated mockups.

You don't need any scopes to access this endpoint.

Request:

```
GET https://api.printful.com/mockup-generator/task?task_key={taskKey}
Authorization: Bearer {token}
X-PF-Store-ID: {storeId}
```

Response body:

```
{
    "code": 200,
    "result": {
        "task_key": "gt-354829063",
        "status": "completed",
        "mockups": [
```

## Get compatible products from the product template

This endpoint returns a list of compatible products based on the `product template`.
This endpoint can showcase other products to your platform's users.
Products returned by this endpoint can be used in ["Swap product used in product template"](#tag/API-related-to-Embeded-design-maker/Swap-product-used-in-product-template)

Request:

```
GET https://api.printful.com/product-templates/{product_template_id}/compatible-products
Authorization: Bearer {token}
X-PF-Store-ID: {storeId}
```

## Swapping product in product template

Use this endpoint to duplicate the design when the end-user chooses a product to transfer the design.
Then open the new EDM session and start editing the duplicated product template.
Specify source product template by providing `product_template_id` in the URL
Use `product_id` to specify target product which the design will be transferred to.

Request:

```
POST https://api.printful.com/product-templates/{product_template_id}/swap-product
Authorization: Bearer {token}
X-PF-Store-ID: {storeId}

Content-Type: application/json

{
    "external_product_id": "test123",
    "product_id": 71
}
```

## Duplicating product template

Use this endpoint to duplicate product template.
Specify source product template by providing `product_template_id` in the URL.
Set external identifier for the new product template by specifying `external_product_id`.

Request:

```
POST https://api.printful.com/product-templates/{product_template_id}/duplicate
Authorization: Bearer {token}
X-PF-Store-ID: {storeId}

Content-Type: application/json

{
    "external_product_id": "test123"
}
```

## Create sync product

Use this endpoint to create new sync product for your store.
`source` property needs to be set to `edm` if the sync product was created from the EDM printfiles. 

Endpoint: `POST https://api.printful.com/store/products`
Required scopes: `sync_products/write`

This endpoint is documented in the [Products API / Create a new Sync Product](https://developers.printful.com/docs/#operation/createSyncProduct) section of the public documentation.

Request:

```
POST https://api.printful.com/store/products
Authorization: Bearer {token}
X-PF-Store-ID: {storeId}

Content-Type: application/json

{
    "sync_product": {
        "name": "test product",
        "source": "edm"
    },
    "sync_variants": [
        {
            "variant_id": 1975,
            "files": [
                {
                    "type": "front",
                    "url": "https://printful-upload.s3-accelerate.amazonaws.com/tmp/47473336e05fe3d589cff0aa7f5e215f/printfile_embroidery_chest_center.png"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
```

Response body:

```
{
    "code": 200,
    "result": {
        "id": 306128315,
        "external_id": "6482f6bb08ef69",
        "name": "test product",
        "variants": 1,
        "synced": 1,
        "thumbnail_url": null,
        "is_ignored": false,
        "contains_pro_content": false,
        "contains_licensed_assets": false
    },
    "extra": [],
}
```

tags.name: Change log
tags.description:
### [1.9.1] - 2025-04-30
- Added [preselectedProductOptions](#tag/Embed-design-maker/Data-structures/preselectedProductOptions-data-structure) option that allows to define which Product Options are going to be preselected when Embedded design maker opens. If Product has these Product Options available.

### [1.9.0] - 2025-04-02
- Added option to trigger [Custom external file library](#tag/Embed-design-maker/Editing-existing-Embedded-template)
- Added option to [Change locale](#tag/Embed-design-maker/Features/Setting-a-locale)
- Added option to [Disable variant selection](#tag/Embed-design-maker/Features/Disable-variant-selection)
- Added option to [Limit color selection to one](#tag/Embed-design-maker/Features/Limit-color-selection-to-one)
- Added option to [Limit size selection to one](#tag/Embed-design-maker/Features/Limit-size-selection-to-one)
- Added option to show [Error modals](#tag/Embed-design-maker/Features/Error-modals)
- Added callback for live price calculation [Design pricing info](#tag/Embed-design-maker/Features/Design-pricing-info)
